about_the_game:
Vol. 1 of the soundtrack for the Touhou danmaku rhythm fangame "Yoiyami Dancers" makes it way onto Steam!

This volume of the soundtrack is a compilation of updated versions of the 18 rhythmical songs used to enliven scenarios #1 and #2.
It also includes in-game versions (21 in total), so if you're worried about not liking changes to the originals, don't be!
You'll definitely want to check out the exclusive art that each track features, too.

* Contains both mp3 and flac files.
* In-game versions were made to be as close to what you hear in-game as possible, but some songs may have circumstances that led to them not being precisely the same.
